Question Body: Write C code to remove all duplicates from an array of integers in place (i.e. without creating a new array).
QuestionAnwser/ExpectedResult: # no idea how to do thiis sorta one //TODO setup these questions properly

Question Body:
What is the output of the following code snippet? #include <stdio.h>

void swap(int *a int *b) {
int tmp = *a;
*a = *b;
*b = tmp;
}

int main() {
int x = 5;
int y = 10;
swap(&x &y);
printf("%d %d" x y);
return 0;
}
